content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, just in time! Remember what I told you about "Starsea Voyages"? {A想象}<style=SizeSmall>I used to tag along with my mentors and drive all over the Starsea, just for the fun of it!</style>
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: Once you craft that <style=Highlight>toolbox</style> at the DIY Bench, I'll be able to install the new parts on your ride. I'll be waiting, swoosh!
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: Wait! Don't tell me you still don't have a <style=Highlight>mattock</style> for gathering materials? I've got one I forged myself. It's yours now!
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: I found this Toolbox Inspo Card that I stole — uh, borrowed! From my mentor! Here, it's yours now.
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: I just ran a full check with my ten-in-one super wrench! It's practically Starsea-ready — {A灵光一现}we're just missing a mount for the <style=Highlight>Lumia Battery</style>!
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: Sounds good, huh? {A思考}I mean, it's not something a wrench can handle all by itself. I'll need some extra tools.
info: 升级车辆-艾莎莎尼_主流程文本II

content: I found this Toolbox Inspo Card that I stole — uh, borrowed! From my mentor! Here, it's yours now.

content: With a <style=Highlight>Lumia Battery</style> installed, you'll be able to travel farther to unknown places, uncover rare materials, and maybe even encounter new friends along the way!
